headline: MetLife (NYSE:MET) Shares Down 13% Over A Week As David Herzog Resigns From Board
summary: MetLife (NYSE:MET) experienced a 13% decline in its share price over the past week, coinciding with significant executive changes as David L. Herzog announced his resignation from the board. Additionally, the issuance of $1 billion in subordinated debentures on March 13 may have heightened investor concerns regarding the company's financial strategy amid broader market volatility. The larger market also faced turmoil, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq down 6% and 5.8%, respectively, as global trade...
